title: The Third Perspective
description:
Perpetually hiding behind a smile to survive his cruel family and stifling college life, Kwon Hyeon is drowning in anxiety and despair. It’s not like he chose to be born into money, but between his father’s demands to uphold the family’s reputation and his classmates’ constant gossiping, the only respite he has is Baek Dowon, his psychiatrist. But everything changes when the mysterious Dowon inducts Hyeon into his secret other life. Infatuated with Dowon and driven by his self-destructive instincts, Hyeon is drawn into a world of twisted desire and pleasure.

[b][u]Español:[/u][/b]
[spoiler]Escondido perpetuamente detrás de una sonrisa para sobrevivir a su cruel familia y sofocando la vida universitaria, Kwon Hyeon se ahoga en la ansiedad y la desesperación. No es como si hubiera elegido nacer con dinero, pero entre las demandas de su padre para mantener la reputación de la familia y los constantes chismes de sus compañeros, el único respiro que tiene es Baek Dowon, su psiquiatra. Pero todo cambia cuando el misterioso Dowon introduce a Hyeon en su otra vida secreta. Encaprichado con Dowon e impulsado por sus instintos autodestructivos, Hyeon se ve arrastrado a un mundo de deseo y placer retorcido.[/spoiler]
